segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even notice, and that scares me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, like nothing bad could happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is so slippery now, and the woman is standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so careless, and it’s worrying me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just full of potential disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something, but I don’t know what.
segments.speaker: PAR
